snippet: The influence of eccentric abstractionists on Sandra Sheehy can be seen in her show “Music From a Garden at Dusk” at Cavin-Morris Gallery.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews works by Sandra Sheehy at Cavin-Morris Gallery.
lead_paragraph: The influence of eccentric abstractionists on Sandra Sheehy can be seen in her show “Music From a Garden at Dusk” at Cavin-Morris Gallery.
